name: FrailtyToolkit
0:
”Alexa, open frailty toolkit”
”Alexa, play frailty toolkit”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: frailty toolkit
des: For Alexa supported speakers. This skill is designed to be used in the home of older adults by older adults themselves without the supervision of clinicians or other caregivers. To make the interaction easier, this skill is designed to be initiated automatically by routines such as at a specific time or sensor (e.g. motion sensor) event. In this case, the older adults do not need to remember to initiate the skill by the regular way of calling its name "frailty toolkit" although the skill can be started by calling its name "frailty toolkit". The skill enables Alexa devices to ask several questions one at a time to its user. If the user's answer is valid, the skill will ask the next question till it reaches the last question.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
